sectionHeading: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Monday January 2 for the New Year's Day holiday.
Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday January 3 at 6:30 a.m.

incidentType: Fayette County Schools Start Monday January 2:
location: Use added caution around school areas.

incidentType: Fayette County Schools Start Monday January 2:
location: Stop as required for school buses that are loading and unloading.
